title: True Love

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
Give your target a present.
Presents:
- a partridge in a pair tree-Nothing
- two turtle doves-Gives your target two autovests
- three french hens-Heals your target
- four calling birds-Roleblocks your target
- five gold rings-Learn your target's role
- six geese a-laying-Attacks your target (Geese are bullies)
- seven swans a-swimming-Sets a trap on your target
- eight maids a-milking-Cleans your target (One of the cows escaped)
- nine ladies dancing-Blackmails your target
- ten lords a-leaping-Your target learns everyone who visits them, excluding yourself and any astral visits)
- eleven pipers piping-Controls your target into another player of your choosing (The piping makes them forget who they were supposed to target)
- twelve drummers drumming-Roleblocks one of your target's attackers

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- Each present may only be used once.
- You may indeed multitask up to 3 times.

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Ensure the continuation of Christmas ~~and Jd's sanity~~

desc:
Post 4560
*Jd REALLY didn't want to do this role, as he hates the song "12 days of Christmas". But, he was low on options when he was deciding the 24 roles for this faction, so, here we are.*
